holidays.title: National Cereal Day
holidays.description: A bowl of cereal, a spoon and some milk equals a party in your mouth!

holidays.title: National Day of Unplugging
holidays.description: Unplug and relax, reflect, be active, visit the outdoors, and connect with loved ones.

holidays.title: Alexander Graham Bell Day
holidays.description: Alexander Graham Bell revolutionized how we communicate when he invented the telephone.

holidays.title: Denim Day for Dementia
holidays.description: On Denim Day for Dementia, raise funds for dementia patients by wearing denim.

holidays.title: Friday Fish Fry Day
holidays.description: Grab your fork and take a bite of your fried fish this Friday Fish Fry Day.

holidays.title: Jose Abad Santos Day
holidays.description: Jose Abad Santos was a Philippine Chief Justice and war hero of the second world war.

holidays.title: National Ben Day
holidays.description: On this day, celebrate all the Bens in your life — it’s National Ben Day!

holidays.title: National Cooper Day
holidays.description: Celebrate National Cooper Day by learning the origins of the term right here with us.

holidays.title: National Crown Roast of Pork Day
holidays.description: Add regality to your dinner table with a crown roast of pork at its center.

holidays.title: National Dress in Blue Day
holidays.description: Wear your favorite blue outfit today to raise awareness about this deadly disease.

holidays.title: National Employee Appreciation Day
holidays.description: Strong employer-employee relations are at the core of any truly successful business.

holidays.title: National Flapjack Day
holidays.description: Indulge in some yummy, fun, and nutrition-rich flapjacks for breakfast to fuel your day.

holidays.title: National Middle Name Pride Day
holidays.description: Where first names are often simple and modern, middle names are more personalized, creative, or cultural.

holidays.title: National Speech and Debate Education Day
holidays.description: Join in today’s activities and let’s prepare students for a brighter future and a better world!

holidays.title: National Tartar Sauce Day
holidays.description: As long as you have your tartar sauce next to it, you can never go wrong with seafood.

holidays.title: Overseas N.H.S. Workers Day
holidays.description: A day to show love and respect to the overseas healthcare workers in the U.K.

holidays.title: Plant Power Day
holidays.description: Get ready to experience and love all the healthy benefits of plant-based eating.

holidays.title: Sock Monkey Day
holidays.description: Give your old socks a new lease on life as we mark Sock Monkey Day.

holidays.title: World Day of Prayer
holidays.description: World Day of Prayer is a truly international day observed in 170 countries across continents.
